AAD.caption: rawJSON
AAD.doc: A stringified JSON array of objects to convert into Excel format. Must be a valid JSON.
AAD.name: rawjson

AAE.caption: Column Widths
AAE.doc: Comma-separated list of column widths (e.g. "20,10,15"). Applies to the columns in order.
AAE.name: colWidths

AAF.caption: Filename
AAF.doc: The name of the generated Excel file (without the .xlsx extension)
AAF.name: filename
